cardBackContents.title: The Application Routine
cardBackContents.p: Steps to bring the vision out.

detailPageContent.title: The Base Layer
detailPageContent.paragraph: Every story has a surface — and beneath it, texture, tone, and layers waiting to be revealed. Our mission is to retell the narratives that have shaped society and family roles, using the tools of storytelling and visual arts. This isn’t about covering up — it’s about contouring truth, highlighting complexity, and giving new form to what was always there. It's story as skincare: deep, radiant, and ready for the light.

detailPageContent.title: The Highlight
detailPageContent.paragraph: We see a world where every role — mother, lover, rebel, healer, artist — can be worn boldly, or blended beautifully. A world where identities aren’t boxed, but curated, layered, and revealed. Our vision is inclusivity with pigment. It’s not about erasing lines — it’s about redefining them. We’re working toward a reality where every shade of humanity belongs in the palette.

detailPageContent.title: The Signature Look
detailPageContent.paragraph: These are the statements we’re serving — bold, layered goals designed to turn vision into visible change.

rows: Secure our essentials — funding, tools, creative fuel — and launch major storytelling moments that make our mission visible from the first glance.
Build a strong base: an artist community that connects, collaborates, and supports. Launch a pilot residency that sets the tone for our future hub.
Shape the blueprint for our art center — complete with vision, structure, and vibe — and begin the search for the perfect setting to host our impact.
Create revenue streams — events, merch, publications — that keep our glow going. Because real sustainability isn’t matte; it’s radiant and resilient.

detailPageContent.paragraph: This is how the look comes together — each move intentional, layered, and made to last.

Structure holds the shape. It’s how we stay stunning and sustainable.

detailPageContent.title: The Compact Case
detailPageContent.paragraph: This is the form that keeps the glow together — functional, intentional, and designed to last.
listItems: Grants-ready. We know how to show up professionally.
Tax-smart. Because glow should never go to waste.
Transparent. Like a clean skincare routine — nothing to hide.
Reinvested. Every shimmer goes back into the look.
Support-ready. Built for donors, fans, and collaborators.

detailPageContent.title: The Inner Mirror
detailPageContent.paragraph: It didn’t start with strategy. It started with a feeling — subtle, like catching your own reflection when you weren’t expecting it. Something in you echoed back something in me: ideals I thought I’d moved past, dreams I never meant to retire. You reminded me that purpose can be worn like perfume — invisible, but undeniable. And in one flash, like light catching highlighter, I saw it: this isn’t about fixing the world. It’s about revealing the glow that was already there.

detailPageContent.title: The Spark Moment
detailPageContent.paragraph: It wasn’t planned. It was a shimmer — three moments, scattered like pigment, suddenly aligning. One held fatigue. One held brilliance. One held mystery. And then it happened, mid-run, heart racing, breath syncing with thought: “We’re missing a Sansa Foundation.” Like the perfect shade you didn’t know you were searching for — until it landed, and everything just made sense.
